Mercy Nnenda Chinwo bụ onye na-agụ egwú gospel nke Naijiria, onye na-abụ abụ, onye na'eme ihe nkiri, onye na na-eme ihe ọchị na onye na-ede egwu
Ọ malitere ịbụ abụ mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ n'òtù ukwe ụmụaka na ụlo ụka ọ na ekpe, ọ meriri Nigerian Idol Season 2 na 2012.
A mụrụ Mercy Nnenda Chinwo ụbọchị nke ise na ọnwa nke itoolu na afọ nari iri itoolu na iri itoolu, na obodo ya bụ Portharcourt, Rivers Steeti
Ọ bụ nwa nke anọ n'ime ụmụ ise n'ezinụlọ ya
Nna ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị obere
Ọ lụrụ Pastor Blessed Uzochikwa onye si Delta Steeti, Nijiria.
Chinwo wepụtara egwu mbụ ya, "Testimony" na afọ puku abụọ na iri ise, na "Igwe" otu afọ ka e mesịrị na 2017. Mercy Chinwo bụ Minista Egwú Gospel
Ọ lụrụ na Port Harcourt na Pastor Blessed Uzochikwa nke Water Brooks Church Lekki na iri na atọ nke ọnwa asatọ na afọ puku abụọ na abụọ

Otu afọ mgbe ọ meriri Nigerian Idol, ọ nwetara ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya na ihe nkiri Yvonne Nelson, House of Gold ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Lucia, ya na Yvonne Jackson, Majid Michel, na Omawumi na ndị ọzọ. Ihe nkiri House of Gold meriri Best Picture na Ghana Movie Awards na Best Ghanaian Movie na 2013 City People
